title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Educational Content Lifecycle Management: Standard-Based Mathematics Content Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The stages of educational content planning, development, evaluation, and repurposing can be explained according to a standard framework
A math problem creation and revision process can be demonstrated using standards-based tools
Improvement proposals for existing learning materials can be presented by applying content lifecycle management principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
